channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: Marni's sentimental guide to giving the past a presence in our homes
item.description: Over the years, I have earned the reputation as the stuff police. I am forever nagging you to purge, declutter, toss, donate, edit, dump, oust, clear, lighten up and let go. But today, sit down, I am going to sentimentally suggest that some old things you should keep.

item.title: Will ‘Superman' fly to streaming services in August? What to know
item.description: Look up! James Gunns' latest superhero "Superman," starring David Corenswet as the iconic Man of Steel, Rachel Brosnahan as Lois Lane and Nicholas Hoult as Lex Luthor,took the American movie audienceby storm and has earned over half a billion dollars worldwide as of Aug. 6, according toBox Office Mojo.

item.title: Jen Pawol umpired spring training game in West Palm Beach, set for MLB history
item.description: Jen Pawol will become the first woman to umpire a Major League Baseball regular-season game when she works three games during the August 8-10 series between theMiami MarlinsandBravesat Atlanta's Truist Park.

item.title: POLL: Vote for best Sarasota, Manatee high school football game for 2025 season
item.description: There are plenty of quality games on the high school football slates this year in Manatee and Sarasota counties. Area teams are opting for out-of-area, and in some cases, out-of-state opponents when filling out their regular-season schedule. Even some of the fall classics have teams travelling up to 3 hours for a game that does not count toward their record for a chance to beef up their slates.

item.title: Who is Lindsey Langston? Miss United States and Cory…
item.description: Florida native Lindsey Langston, the current Miss United States and a Republican state committeewoman,has alleged that Congressman Cory Millsthreatened to release intimate images and videos of her after she broke up with him, according to police complaint.

item.title: 14-year-old Florida teen arrested in shooting of parents…
item.description: A 14-year-old Floridateenager killed his parentsin their Middleburg home and walked to a church where he called 911 shortly after midnight and waited for deputies, Clay County Sheriff Michelle Cook said.

item.title: Best local bars? 11 unique spots worth a road trip in Florida
item.description: Thebest barsin Florida aren’t just for grabbing a drink — they’re for creating memories, and maybe a story you shouldn’t share at work on Monday.

item.title: Pregnant women shouldn't have disability parking access
item.description: As a mother, grandmother, anthropologist, disabled senior and rational human being, I'm struggling to retrieve my chin from the floor having read therecent guest columnreferencing a successful bill by state Rep. Fiona McFarland allowing pregnant women to obtain disabled parking permits ("McFarland stands up for Florida's pregnant women," Aug. 4
